version_description:
- Improved Interface
- Added training
- Added control settings
- Improved the logic of traffic
- Added new trucks and trailers
- Added a new freight traffic mode (a lot of cargo, competition, the bandits, the police)
- Added gadjets / up

Added new mode:
- Realistic truck physics with trailer
- Large location with cities and villages
- 10 types of cargo
- Gas station system
